summary: Diff adds a landing/title page with prominent ANIMEXIS + owner line and an explicit "Enter Gallery" button, and switches App to render landing first. However, routing is implemented via internal React state rather than actual URL routes ("/" and "/gallery"), so the app may not truly open at route "/" nor navigate to "/gallery" in the browser address bar/history as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Make the app open on a dedicated title page at route "/" (and not the gallery).
missing_requirements.reason: The app initializes a local `currentRoute` state to '/' but does not implement real URL-based routing; there is no evidence that the browser route/path is set to "/" or that direct navigation/bookmarking works.

missing_requirements.requirement: Proceed from the title page to the existing gallery page at route "/gallery" via a clear UI affordance (no scroll gating).
missing_requirements.reason: The title page provides a button that calls `onNavigate`, but navigation only updates local component state and does not change the URL to "/gallery" (no pushState/router usage shown).

hallucinated_features.description: Adds an extra subtitle line "An Abstract Archive of Anime Worlds" to the title hero content.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to display the app name and owner name prominently; no subtitle text was requested.
